name: Kevin Sallée
title: Product Manager | Senior Software Engineer
summary:
Product Manager / Senior Software Engineer with 19 years of experience in team leadership, software architecture and development. Now focused on AI integration, product strategy, and enterprise-scale solutions.

Bringing AI and modern web technologies into M&E production pipelines, with hands-on experience in LLMs, agentic frameworks, and tool development.

Previously managed and scaled engineering teams at Autodesk, Prime Focus, and Rodeo FX.
